import{EventType,ModalSize,ModalActionLevel,MenuItemType}from'@datadog/ui-extensions-sdk';export var setupDashboardCogMenu=function setupDashboardCogMenu(client){// provide cog menu items dynamically if needed
client.dashboard.cogMenu.onRequest(function(){return{items:[{actionType:MenuItemType.LINK,href:'https://google.com',label:'link to google',key:'link',order:-1}]};});client.events.on(EventType.WIDGET_SETTINGS_MENU_CLICK,function(context){if(context.menuItem.key==='open-confirmation'){client.modal.open({actionLabel:'Yes',cancelLabel:'Nevermind',title:'Please verify!',key:'confirmation-modal',actionLevel:ModalActionLevel.DANGER,message:'Are you sure really sure?'});}// open an iframe modal defined inline here in controller
if(context.menuItem.key==='open-custom-modal'){client.modal.open({key:'custom-modal',size:ModalSize.LARGE,source:'modal'},{message:'Hi! I was sent here from the custom widget settings menu ðŸ‘‹',options:context.widget.definition.options});}// open an iframe side panel defined inline here in controller
if(context.menuItem.key==='open-custom-panel'){console.log('xxxx context',context);client.sidePanel.open({key:'custom-panel-from-controller',source:'panel',title:'Custom Sidepanel'},{message:'Hi! I was sent here from the custom widget settings menu ðŸ‘‹',options:context.widget.definition.options});}});// listen for cog menu click events
client.events.on(EventType.DASHBOARD_COG_MENU_CLICK,function(context){if(context.menuItem.key==='open-confirmation'){client.modal.open({actionLabel:'Yes',cancelLabel:'Nevermind',title:'Please verify!',key:'confirmation-modal',actionLevel:ModalActionLevel.DANGER,message:'Are you sure really sure?'});}// open an iframe modal defined inline here in controller
if(context.menuItem.key==='open-custom-modal'){client.modal.open({key:'custom-modal',size:ModalSize.LARGE,source:'modal'},{message:'Hi! I was sent here from the dashboard cog menu ðŸ‘‹'});}// open an iframe side panel defined inline here in controller
if(context.menuItem.key==='open-custom-panel'){console.log('xxxx context',context);client.sidePanel.open({key:'custom-panel-from-controller',source:'panel',title:'Custom Sidepanel'},{message:'Hi! I was sent here from the dashboard cog menu ðŸ‘‹'});}});};
